name: Magic and Legend: Star Seekers
storyline:
In a previous episode, aliens scoured the galaxy, taking planet resources to feed their never-ending greed!

They came to earth & went back in time so they could take our resources without any of our advanced technology to stop them! Little did they know that two bros’, followed them back in time!

They thwarted their efforts and took out the mother brain! However, before our intrepid time knights saved the day. The aliens found hidden power in the crown jewels and stole them!!!

Stars are now falling to earh and the gravitational pull of them will make the moon crash into earth, destroying the plannet

Only two heroes can save us!!! Magic & Legend: Star Seekers
summary:
Magic and Legend: Star Seekers is an arcade platformer with the goal of collecting stars across multiple levels themed on locations around the world with a variety of other game styles in between.
The second in a planned trilogy of homebrew games.
